Address.Address1: Near Sola Overbridge, S. G Highway

Description.Text:
Property Location
Centrally located in Ahmedabad, The Fern Ahmedabad is convenient to Gujarat University and Gulmohar Park Mall. This 4.5-star hotel is within close proximity of ISCON Mall and Sardar Patel Stadium.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 96 guestrooms featuring MP3 docking stations and minibars. 42-inch LCD televisions with cable programming provide entertainment, while wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected. Conveniences include laptop-compatible safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take time to pamper yourself with a visit to the full-service spa. If you're looking for recreational opportunities, you'll find a health club, an indoor pool, and a fitness center. Additional features include wireless Internet access (surcharge), concierge services, and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 2 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. Mingle with other guests at a complimentary reception, held daily.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms. Guests may use a shuttle from the airport to the hotel for a surcharge, and free valet parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at Noon Check-out time is Noon
Grab a bite to eat at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 2 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. Mingle with other guests at a complimentary reception, held daily.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Gujarat University - 3 km / 1.9 mi
Gulmohar Park Mall - 4.3 km / 2.7 mi
ISCON Mall - 4.9 km / 3 mi
Sardar Patel Stadium - 5 km / 3.1 mi

Hathi Singh Temple - 7.4 km / 4.6 mi

Manek Chowk - 7.7 km / 4.8 mi

Swaminarayan Temple - 8 km / 5 mi
Sidi Bashir Mosque and the Shaking Minarets - 9.1 km / 5.7 mi
Naginawadi - 10.4 km / 6.4 mi
Adalaj Vav - 12.9 km / 8 mi

Lothal - 66.7 km / 41.5 mi

The preferred airport for The Fern Ahmedabad is Ahmedabad (AMD-Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel Intl.) - 10.1 km / 6.3 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
